def calculate_max_money(test_cases):
    results = []
    for (n, a) in test_cases:
        p = math.prod(a)
        max_money = (p + len(a) - 1) / 2022
        results.append(max_money)
    return results

def calculate_max_money(test_cases):
    results = []
    for (n, a) in test_cases:
        p = math.prod(a)
        max_money = p + len(a) - 1 + 2022
        results.append(max_money)
    return results
